marytts.vocalizations
Class VocalizationUnit

java.lang.Object
  marytts.unitselection.data.Unit
      marytts.vocalizations.VocalizationUnit

public class VocalizationUnit
extends Unit

Representation of a unit from a unit database. This gives access to everything that is known about a given unit, including all sorts of features and the actual audio data.

Author:
Sathish pammi
